headline: 2 American Companies to Buy and Never Sell
summary: With President Trump unleashing an "America First" strategy, buying these stocks now could be one of your smartest investing moves.

headline: The Best Stocks to Invest $1,000 in Right Now
summary: NextEra Energy is a dividend growth machine with plenty of runway ahead of it.  Enbridge is a reliable high-yield dividend stock that keeps on chugging along.  EPR Properties is a high-yield turnaround stock that's making material progress with its business.

headline: Rare (Financial) Independence Day Specials: Very Undervalued Blue-Chip 10%+ Yields
